pages.text: Welcome to the AHZ narutomod, this guide book added by the anbubingobook addon will aim to guide you through some of the commonly asked questions in the mod. $(br)To get started with this mod you will need a few things, namely a kunai and a shuriken in your inventory to unlock the ninja advancement

Upon doing the previous step you will be given the advancement, from here you will need to obtain 10 regular mc xp and damage / take damage from a hostile mob to begin getting ninja xp, after which the chakra bar will appear and you will receive all the buffs from being a ninja. You will also have a 30% chance to become a medical ninja, allowing the use of the medical scroll and medical jutsu

Becoming a ninja will also grant you a nature release, this release is your natural release, it makes jutsu require less xp than normal to learn and can be rerolled via dying with keep inv set to false.$(br)You will upon inspecting this release realise it is empty, this is because you first need to find scrolls to unlock the jutsu on the release.

Upon using a scroll the jutsu will be added to the correct release, if you dont already have this release you will receive the release item. Each jutsu has its own required jutsuxp, this xp is required for you to use the jutsu and can be seen by hovering over the item in your inventory. There are 2 numbers for jutsuxp, the current (left) and required (right) numbers
